document.docAuthor: Enushchenko, Ilya V. & Semenov, Viktor B.
document.masterDocTitle: A review of the genus Gyrophaena Mannerheim 1830 (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Aleocharinae: Gyrophaenina) of the Caucasus and adjacent territories

, A.V. Shavrin leg. (cIE).

Later, the same author (Leder 1886 ) recorded this species from Lenkoran.
Roubal ( 1913 )
cited the species from Karachay-Cherkessia, Teberda River.
Nikitskiy & al. ( 2008 )
recorded it from Khosta and Guzeripl', the Caucasian Biosphere Reserve.
